scripts.app:set: npm i && npm run prepare && cd app/client && npm i && cd ../server && npm i && npm run db:format && npm run db:generate && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:deploy
scripts.app:dev: concurrently "cd app/client && npm run start" "cd app/server && npm run start:dev"
scripts.app:build: cd app/server && npm i && npm run db:generate && npm run build && cd ../client && npm i && npm run build && cd ../..
scripts.app:prod: cd app/server && npm run db:deploy && npm run start:prod
